meanings.definition: Not belonging to or affiliated with a church.
meanings.sent1: The unchurched family preferred to spend their Sundays hiking in nature.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the unchurched neighbors never participated in church events.
meanings.sent3: The unchurched cat refused to enter the church even when tempted with treats.
meanings.sent4: The unchurched garden stood out among the rows of religiously decorated yards.
meanings.sent5: The unchurched sky seemed to embrace all beliefs under its vast expanse.

meanings.definition: To not attend or be a member of a church.
meanings.sent1: Many in the town remained unchurched despite the inviting church bells.
meanings.sent2: He unchurched himself after a disagreement with the church leadership.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel unchurched itself by choosing to nap in the tree instead of attending service.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to unchurch surprised her family, who were devout churchgoers.
meanings.sent5: The decision to unchurch was like removing a heavy burden from his shoulders.
